text: (itaik kelviyurra yusuhp â€˜â€˜munnar cenrupona visayankalai ivvaru vicaranai ceyyumpati nan kuriya) itan karanam; niccayamaka nan (en ejamanakiya) avar maraivayirunta camayattil avarukku nan turokam ceyyavillai enpatai avar arintu kolvatutan, niccayamaka allah turokikalin culcciyai nataipera vituvatillai en(patai arivip)patarkakavume'' (enru kurinar)
